Class PixelColorizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.PixelColorizer

  • public class PixelColorizer
extends java.lang.Object

        public static void colorPixel(short[] rgb,
                              hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.RayIntersection intersection,
                              hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.Scene scene,
                              hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.Point3D eye)
        Colorizes the pixel whose rbg components the given array represents.
        Parameters:
        rgb - red, green and blue components of the pixel
        intersection - intersection of the traced ray with the nearest object
        scene - scene with objects
        eye - eye of the beholder
